comments.content:
A bit small and fuzzy but I'd probably go with Paul Renner's [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084052/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Futura).  
Previous [discussion](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084052/http:/typophile.com/node/82538) on this topic which should confirm 'Futura' track.
